channel.title: Websites
channel.description:
kay i have been having alot of trouble with free websites and junk
I got a .tk site and 000webhost but its just so confuseing i want to set up a website with a forum and mysql for free so i can make it so users have to register on the forums to login to the game and have an automatic donation system If anyone has advice on where i can get a free website for all that i need the help . I will be planning on upgradeing to a paid website with alot more but i need a good start thankyou guys and no flameing please i know im a newb already :)

item.title: Websites
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

If you want private message me and I can help you with hosting, as for the donation system you will need to look through the tutorial section.

Read full topic
